info.name: Speech to Text Helper App
info.summary: A smart picker provider that utilises the Speech to Text OCP API
info.description:
This app implements a smart picker provider that utilises the Speech to Text OCP API. It enables the user to generate transcriptions of recorded audio or an audio file provided.
NOTE: This integration requires a separate integration to be installed that exposes a SpeechToText processing provider, like the Whisper Speech-To-Text App, for example.
info.author: Anupam Kumar
